choose_mood: Choose from the most popular moods

desc.energized: You feel full of energy and ready to move, act, and get things done.
desc.creative: You're inspired, full of ideas, and eager to express yourself.
desc.anxious: You feel a sense of restlessness or inner worry.
desc.sad: You need comfort and emotional space.
desc.spiritual: You're seeking connection with God or a moment to reflect.
desc.overwhelmed: Too many thoughts. You need to slow down.
desc.grateful: You're feeling a deep sense of gratitude.
desc.happy: You're feeling uplifted, smiling, and positive.
desc.focus: You need to keep your attention on a goal.
desc.peaceful: You feel deep calm and inner lightness.
desc.curious: You're eager to explore and learn something new.
desc.determined: You have a clear purpose and want to achieve it.
desc.seeking-inspiration: You want to reignite ideas or find motivation.
desc.reflective: You need mental space to think and listen to yourself.
desc.at-peace: You feel a sense of harmony with yourself and your surroundings.
desc.romantic: You're longing for love, beauty, and emotional connection.
desc.celebratory: You're in the mood to celebrate, connect, and enjoy.
desc.active: It's time to move: workout, walk, physical energy.
desc.playful: You're in the mood for lightness, play, and fun.

hero.title: Find your mental balance
hero.subtitle: Write how you feel. FocusField+ will take care of the rest.
hero.placeholder: E.g.: I'm looking for the ideal environment to focus...
hero.not_found: No mood recognized. Try another description.
